import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import xgboost as xgb
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
import lightgbm as lgb

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering: create family size and cabin count
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# Extract title from Name (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Miss)
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_map = {
        'Mr.': 'Mr', 'Mrs.': 'Mrs', 'Miss.': 'Miss', 'Master.': 'Master',
        'Dr.': 'Dr', 'Rev.': 'Rev', 'Col.': 'Col', 'Major.': 'Major',
        'Mlle.': 'Miss', 'Mme.': 'Mrs', 'Don.': 'Sir', 'Sir.': 'Sir',
        'Lady.': 'Lady', 'Capt.': 'Capt', 'Countess.': 'Countess',
        'Jonkheer.': 'Sir', 'Dona.': 'Lady'
    }
    return title_map.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# Fill missing values in Age with median by Title and Pclass
train_df['Age'] = train_df.groupby(['Title', 'Pclass'])['Age'].transform(
    lambda x: x.fillna(x.median()) if x.dtype == 'float64' else x
)
test_df['Age'] = test_df.groupby(['Title', 'Pclass'])['Age'].transform(
    lambda x: x.fillna(x.median()) if x.dtype == 'float64' else x
)

# Fill missing Embarked with mode
train_df['Embarked'] = train_df['Embarked'].fillna(train_df['Embarked'].mode()[0])
test_df['Embarked'] = test_df['Embarked'].fillna(test_df['Embarked'].mode()[0])

# Fill missing Fare with median of group by P
